name: SpaceJamComedy
description: On your long journey across the galaxy, you found your one and only love, the almighty Lord Helmchen. There is just one problem Lord Helmchen doesn’t feel the same for you, so you must win his heart for you. Luckily you know how to accomplish that. His favorite food are peanuts and just in that moment your ship gets attacked by the rare space-peanut monkeys. This rare species is known for there ability to drop tasty peanuts when they die. So your great Mission begins. HUNT DOWN THESE DAMN MONKYES FOR THE POWER OF LOVE.
